name: Juliana Ferreira
remarks: Juliana's decomposing body was found lying in a sugar cane field late on the afternoon of Tuesday 2nd October. She may have been stabbed. The Civil Police reported that the corpse was in an advanced degree of decomposition.

name: Ciara Minaj Carter Frazier
remarks: Ciara was stabbed multiple times by a man after an argument late on Wednesday 3rd October in the West Garfield Park neighborhood. She died at the scene.

name: Danielly Ferraz
remarks: Danielly was stabbed in the Carapina region of Serra on Wednesday 3rd October. News of her murder was apparently not reported by media outlets.

name: M. García
remarks: M. died in hospital just under a fortnight after undergoing a silicone filler injection on 20th September.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found hanged with burn marks on their legs.

name: Gabriela Ramos Menezes
remarks: Gabriela's body was found on the beach of Ponta Negra in the West Zone of Manaus. Her face was disfigured and her eyes were missing. The official cause of death was drowning, but her family says she was killed.

name: Itzel Aidana ávila
remarks: Itzel died by suicide several days after publishing a viral video admonishing Lupita Jones for speaking out against the participation of trans women in the Miss Universe contest.

name: Monse
remarks: Monse was shot from a passing vehicle on the bridge of Plaza Sendero at around 3:30am on Sunday 7th October. She died in hospital.

name: Janet
remarks: Janet was stabbed in the neck at around 3am on Tuesday 9th October. Her body was found by a motorist after being left lying in the street on Benjamín Flores Avenue.

name: Regina Denise Brown ("Gina")
remarks: Regina was found dead in her home after an arson attack on 10th October. Her body was found by firefighers after a passerby called the fire department after seeing a fire in Brown's home. Kenneth Lamont Jenkins, 37, was arrested in connection with the fire and charged with murder on 7th November. He was an ex-convict who had previously served 18 years in prison for armed robbery and possession of a stolen vehicle.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died by suicide in her yard on Rio Nazas Street. Her body was found after friends went looking for her. Note that although the media reported them as "a male who practiced transvestism" they were probably a trans woman.

name: Lorrane da Silva
remarks: Lorrane was shot several times in the street. She died at the scene. Witnesses reported seeing two young men with guns walking nearby.

name: Pitielly Edleuza Prado
remarks: Pitielly was a hairdresser. She was found stabbed with a pair of scissors inside her home on the morning of Saturday 13th October. The previous night she had been out to a party with friends. After they had returned home she had gone on alone to another bar.

name: Marisa Sánchez ("Haitianita")
remarks: Marisa was found dead with head trauma on avenida Barceló in Punta Cana. A bloodied stone and a condom were found near her body. It was presumed that she was killed by a client she had been seen with earlier. In March 2019 police arrested Jesus Santana Marte, 25, for her murder and that of Jéssica Bracamonte in December 2018.

name: Jessica Gonzaga
remarks: Jessica was attacked in front of a bar in Largo do Arouche at around 4:50am by a group of men. A witness reported hearing them screaming abuse and the name "Bolsonaro". After being stabbed she managed to walk to a nearby hotel where security guards called the emergency services. She was taken to hospital, but died en-route. Armando Vila Real Filho, 28, was arrested for her murder.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot in the head by two men on a motorcycle. She died at the scene.

name: Patricia Aylen Molina
remarks: Patricia and her former partner Victoria Fabro, 22, were both found shot dead in a car. Each had sustained a gunshot wound to the head. Patricia was a police officer.

name: Carol Machado
city: Linha Frei Plácido, Xaxim, Santa Catarina
location: Linha Frei Plácido, Xaxim, Santa Catarina (Brazil)
remarks: Carol was beaten, raped and shot dead  at about 7am on Thursday 18th October. Her body was found on a dirt road.

name: Laysa Fortuna
remarks: Laysa was attacked in the centre of Aracaju. She died in hospital from her injuries. According to witnesses, her attacker was identified as Alex da Silva Cardoso , a street person, who while walking through the area threatened several trans women. He stated that he said that if Jair Bolsonaro (PSL)  was elected president, all trans people would be killed. Laysa herself had expressed fear about what would happen if Bolsonaro was elected. On the morning of Saturday 20th October Alex Silva Cardoso, 33, was arrested for her murder.

name: Ariana Esquivel
remarks: Ariana died by suicide. She was a police officer and was suffering discrimination at work.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot several times.

name: Karholine Mendonça da Silva
remarks: Karholine was stabbed in the groin and died in hospital. Her killer is reported to have shouted slurs in the name of Presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro. Witnesses report that the murderers stabbed her shouting loudly "Bolsonaro, Bolsonaro is going to kill a fagot".

name: Robertha Welmont Moraes
remarks: Robertha was shot twice in the head on the rural Estrada Roseira road just outside Maringá. She died at the scene. CCTV images are being examined to identify a vehicle seen leaving the road at 5am on the morning of her death.

name: Yuri Vanesa Salazar López
remarks: Yuri's body was found on 22nd October. She had been murdered.

name: B. Alves Gonçalves
remarks: B. was found dead with dozens of stab wounds at around 10am on Saturday 27th October, having last been seen alive two days earlier. They leave behind a 15 month old daughter.

name: Ciano Sacchi
remarks: Ciano was a trans man who suffered from depression and died from suicide. He was transitioning and had already undergone top surgery.

name: Robertinha
remarks: Robertinha was a victim of intentional drowning.

name: I. Hernández
city: Colonia Santa María, Soyapango, San Salvador
location: Colonia Santa María, Soyapango, San Salvador (El Salvador)
remarks: I. was murdered in Colonia Santa María on Thursday 25th October. Five individuals were detained in connection with her murder.

name: Dja Santos
remarks: Dja was a hairdresser. She was robbed and then stabbed with a pair of scissors. 3 suspects were arrested after attempting to withdraw cash using her bank card.

name: Lorhany Kalarhary
remarks: Lorhany's naked body was found by her mother on the floor of her home. She had been stabbed 9 times. Samuel Almeida Matos, 19, has been arrested and charged with murder. In testimony, he claimed to have committed the murder on the grounds that he had been deceived by the victim - in other words, he killed her because she was trans.

name: Sheila Brites Bodago
remarks: Sheila was found dead at home on the morning of 29th October. She may have died by suicide.

name: Maria Cecília
remarks: Maria's body was found on avenue Nossa Senhora de Fátima in the Lagoinha neighborhood. She had been stabbed 11 times in the neck.

name: Natacha de Oliveira
remarks: Natacha was shot at home while drinking with friends in her back yard. According to her mother, that afternoon she had received a phone call from an unknown woman stating that "her time had come" and that she had best be careful. At around 10pm two people arrived, asked which one was Natacha and then shot her in the head. She died at the scene.

name: Brenda Zarik Sifuentes Andrade
city: La Esperanza District, Trujillo, La Libertad
location: La Esperanza District, Trujillo, La Libertad (Peru)
remarks: Brenda was suffocated and stabbed in the neck by the man she was dating in the early hours of the day before her 36th birthday. Before fleeing he stole a laptop, a cell phone and cash. Brenda was an enterprising woman who supported her family financially through three businesses, one selling decoration and two footwear. She was also an active member of Red Trans de La Libertad.

name: Estrella
city: Rancho San Dimas, San Antonio la Isla, Estado de México
location: Rancho San Dimas, San Antonio la Isla, Estado de México (Mexico)
remarks: Estrella was a stylist. Her body was found with stab wounds inside her home.

name: Elisângela
remarks: Elisângela was one of two trans women shot near where the Ring Road crosses the BR-116 highway. Her colleague Duda survived. Elisângela was shot three times and died at the scene, but Duda (the other intended victim) survived.

name: G. Souza Rodrigues
remarks: G. was beaten to death with a toilet in the early hours of Thursday 8th November. Thauan Bueno da Silva, 24, was arrested and charged with felony manslaughter (with intent to kill).

name: Flavia C.
remarks: Flavia was killed within the beauty salon where she worked.

name: O. O. Fuentes Angel
remarks: O.'s body was found in undergrowth on Sunday 11th November. She had been shot.

name: Raphaela Souza
remarks: Raphaela was shot twice in the head on the night of Wednesday 14th November in the Miro Cairo - Conquista neighborhood. After she was killed her cell phone was stolen. Raphaela was a social worker, hairdresser, and an important spokeswoman for LGBT causes in the southwest of the state. She worked at the Municipal Department of Social Development (Semdes) and taught hairdressing classes for women enrolled in the Bolsa Família program. She was also a member of the State Council for the Rights of the Population of Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transvestite and Transgender (CELGBT), and coordinated the Finas Collective of transvestites and transsexuals.

name: Fanny Aguiar
remarks: Fanny was stabbed several times by her partner, Fernando Izquierdo, 21. Her neighbours called the police when they heard screams. Upon arrival, the police found him escaping with some of Fanny's belongings and covered in her blood. He was arrested and confessed to the crime. Fanny and the suspect had been living together for only a month when he killed her.

name: Flávia de Oliveira
remarks: Flávia was found stabbed to death at home on Sunday 18th November. Her partner of 6 months was arrested and confessed to the crime.

name: Karla López Laureano
city: La Esperanza District, Trujillo, La Libertad
location: La Esperanza District, Trujillo, La Libertad (Peru)
remarks: Karla was strangled in her room with an electricity cable. Her body was found by her brother the following morning when he went to wake her for breakfast. Karla was a stylist. The last time she was seen alive she was with a man with whom she was in a relationship.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was reported to have been shot. No other information is known.

name: Ruiva
remarks: Ruiva is reported via social network posts to have been shot dead. No other information is known.

name: Gabriella Torres
remarks: Gabriella was shot 5 times at point blank range by two men on a motorcycle. She died in hospital. Her murder took place on Travessa Ajuricaba, in the neighborhood Vila da Prata in the West Zone of Manaus.

name: Perlita de Guerrero
remarks: Perlita was shot dead inside her salon on calle 5 de Mayo. It is suspected she was killed by a cartel after withholding an extortion payment.

name: Nahomy Alexandra López Orellana ("La Pepita")
remarks: Nahomy's body was found within an overturned car. She had been strangled.

name: Fábia Ju Dias
remarks: Fábia was beaten by two men in the middle of the street in the Santa Terezinha neighborhood of Manhuaçu. A third assailant then came out of a bar and struck her around the head with a piece of wood. She died at the scene.

name: Mikaela Africana Sanches
remarks: Mikaela was shot 3 times by a group of three assailants in front of Eladio Lasserre Hospital at around 4pm on Monday 26th November. She died in hospital.

name: Tydi Dansbury
remarks: Tydi was found with a gunshot wound on the 2400 block of Guilford Avenue at about 4:15 a.m. on Monday 26th November. She died in hospital. A police spokesman said that there were reports of a loud argument preceding the shots and that a dark-colored car was seen speeding from the scene.

name: Duda
remarks: Duda was shot in the head and chest by two men on a motorcycle in the Vila do Rato neighborhood of Marabá at around midnight on 28th November. She died at the scene.

name: Rajni
remarks: Rajni was shot on the evening of Wednesday 28th November after a dispute over collecting money between two groups of trans people. A 28-year-old has been arrested.

name: Luisa Fernanda Hernandez
remarks: Luisa's body was found in a car at the corner of bulevar Aristóteles and calle Mineral at 4am on Sunday 2nd December. She had been shot in the head. Luisa lived in the Valle Dorado neighborhood and worked in a shoe factory.

name: Karliane Vitoria Rodrigues
remarks: Karliane was shot in the back by an assassin who fled on a bicycle.

name: J. C. Pereira de Lima
remarks: J. was killed by her partner. She lived in a rural area of Itanhaém with him and had been missing since early 2017. José Uilbson Brito dos Santos, 31, was arrested after being found in Campinas in a drug rehabilitation clinic. He confessed to killing her and her body was found buried less than 10 meters from the home where they lived.

name: Nancy de Monza
remarks: Nancy is reported to have been "murdered by Isis Santos with an iron rod". Her date of death is unknown. The date given is approximate.

name: Keanna Mattel ("Kelly Stough")
remarks: Keanna was found dead on the east side of the city by police at around 6am on Friday 7th November. She had been shot. Authorities were initially investigating claims by a 46-year-old man who told officers that he was robbed in the area and fired a shot, but is unsure if he hit the trans woman. However, on Monday 10th December Sterling Heights Baptist pastor Albert Weathers, 46, was charged with her murder. The murder which had previously thought to be the result of a robbery gone bad might, in fact, be a  hate crime.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of an unidentified trans woman was found with signs of violence in a ditch at the entrance to Colonia Eterna Primavera in zone 4 of Villa Nueva.

name: Victória Landeiro
remarks: Victória was shot dead on the street by a client who is reported to have been a federal police officer. She died in hospital. A witness reported that the killer had previously attempted to engage another sex worker in the Bairro Novo Horizonte area and had introduced himself as a federal police officer. After she turned him down he went to Victória and shot her.

name: Scarlety Mastroianyy
remarks: Scarlety was beaten and stabbed by a group of 3 men in the centre of Londrina at dawn on Monday 10th December. She died at the scene. Another trans woman who was also attacked managed to escape.

name: Manuel Luna
remarks: Manuel's burnt body was found on the edge of a dirt road called 8 de diciembre, which links the communities of La Esperanza and La Concepcion. Their body was found by neighbours who were walking in the area. The garments they were wearing led the authorities to initially believe that the body belonged to a woman. However, several days later the body was identified by the victim's family as Manuel Luna, a "31-year-old openly homosexual young man who, according to his relatives, used to cross-dress." We will obviously never know their true gender identity.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found floating in the water at Praia do Itararé (Itararé beach). The case was recorded as a suspicious death. The preliminary finding was that she died of drowning, but DNA was collected to perform additional tests. She was not carrying any identifying documents.

name: Gabi Blak
remarks: Gabi was found dead in the grounds of a health centre on the morning of 12th December. Her body showed signs of sexual assault and she was hanged with a pair of jeans.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was beaten to death by a group of men. Police have launched a murder investigation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found on a football pitch. She had been beaten and had a small knife in her hand, which officials say may have been used to defend against her attackers.

name: Scarlett Cedeño
remarks: Scarlett was found dead inside a house in the Pan American neighborhood of Cali on 18th December. A substantial quantity of blood was were found on the floor. She had last been seen alive 4 days earlier in the company of an unidentified man.

name: Marilin Sosa
remarks: Marilin died in hospital a year after being run over. She was one of the four victims who had made accusations that senior police officers were involved in people trafficking.

name: Erika Araújo
remarks: Erika died by suicide. No other information is known.

name: Litzy Hurtado
remarks: Litzy was stabbed in the heart inside a nightclub in El Alto. Another trans woman who was with her was cut several times on the face but survived. Reportedly both had been on the receiving end of harassment and insults from a group of young men. Five suspects were identified via CCTV footage and subsequently arrested.

name: Valquíria
remarks: Valquíria and her companion Gabriel, 19, were stabbed inside a kitchenette in the Parque das Estrelas. Raimundo Sousa Silva was arrested on suspicion of double murder. The suspect  Ronaldo Pires dos Reis lived in the same building. In September 2019 a pre-trial detention warrant was issued in his name.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found on a road connecting the state Otates-Colonia Francisco I Madero highway to the Agua Blanca community in Abasolo. She had been shot at least 5 times.

name: Marcinha Rodrigues Pereira
remarks: Marcinha was found dead behind an abandoned building in a cornfield late on the morning of Thursday 20th December. Her body showed signs of strangulation. The police initially suspected that she may have been hanged and her body dragged from the place where she was killed in the Industrial district, just outside the city. Matheus da Silva Oliveira, 18, confessed to strangling her and dumping her body. He also stole her cellphone and some money.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died by suicide. Reportedly she was homeless and someone had taken pictures of her sleeping rough, posted them to social networks and made fun of her.

name: Gaby
remarks: Gaby's body was found in scrubland in a vacant lot in the Bellavista neighborhood. Her head had been crushed with a large rock.

name: Jéssica Bracamonte
remarks: Jéssica was found dead with a neck wound in a vacant lot in the vicinity of Barceló Avenue in the Barrio Nuevo sector. She was of Haitian nationality and lived in Higüey. In March 2019 police arrested Jesus Santana Marte, 25, for her murder and that of Marisa Sánchez in October 2018.

name: Denisse Hernández Rivero
remarks: Denisse's decomposing body was found wrapped in blankets and dumped on the Chilpancingo-Tixtla road on 25th December. She had been stabbed in the chest.

name: Nicolly Banks
remarks: Nicolly was shot 11 times at around 8:20am on Rua Liopino Lourenço de Araújo while she was on her way to the gym. Neighbours reported hearing an argument and then screams for help, followed by shots. Friends of the victim reported she was being threatened both in person and by phone, and had already suffered a homicide attempt about a month ago. At the time a hooded person called upon her previous home and shot twice at her, but missed.

name: Valentina Herrera Guzman
remarks: Valentina was murdered. No other information is known.

name: Melissa Brunely
remarks: Melissa was run over twice on the BR-101 highway. It appears that she may have been killed elsewhere beforehand and her body then dumped on the highway. Two cars then ran over her body, crushing her skull. The second was a police vehicle. Shortly before she died she had reportedly had an argument with a man in a shop.

name: Rogéria Paiva
remarks: Rogéria was shot dead late on 29th December on Rua Carvalho Nogueira. She was a community leader and had clashed with members of a criminal gang.

name: Sabrina Santos Vidal
remarks: Sabrina was stabbed inside her home. Her partner Vítor da Silva Santos was arrested. Sabrina was a teacher. As a result of the crime, the city hall issued a note cancelled the city's year-end festivities, including music events and fireworks.

name: Devora Montolio
remarks: Devora was stabbed in the Buenos Aires neighborhood of Maimón. According to witnesses she had had an argument with a bricklayer named José just before she was killed.

name: Mikinho Lima dos Santos
remarks: Mikinho was shot in the Santo Antônio neighborhood of Lajeado at around 5am on Tuesday 1st January.

name: S. Biswas
remarks: S. was found lying on the floor of her flat with a deep ligature mark on her neck on the morning of Tuesday 1st January. It is suspected that she died by suicide.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was reportedly the target of a physical assault at their home. They were rescued but did not survive.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: An unidentified trans woman was found dead in the road at 4am on 1st January. She had died as a result of falling from a moving vehicle. A 55-year-old man has been arrested.

name: Laura Muñoz Arcila
remarks: Laura's body was found in an apartment in the San Bosco neighborhood. She had been stabbed. José Rufino Pinto Duarte has been arrested for her murder.

name: Danielle Myriam
remarks: Danielle died by suicide. Reportedly societal transphobia (including the impact of the current media campaign against trans people in the UK) was a strong contributing factor.

name: Victória Jugnet
remarks: Victória died by suicide. Reportedly fear of the political climate and violence in the country were contributing factors.

name: Name Unknown
city: Playa del Carmen, Solidaridad, Quintana Roo
location: Playa del Carmen, Solidaridad, Quintana Roo (Mexico)
remarks: The victim was shot at least twice on 68th Street between 40th and 45th avenues at around 10:30pm on Friday 4th January. Her two assailants escaped on a motorcycle.

name: Carla Girón Londoño
remarks: Carla was shot by three men while she was riding her father's motorcycle. She died in hospital.

name: Dana Martin
remarks: Dana was found dead in her car at about 11pm on Sunday 6th January. She had been shot.

name: Hande Şeker
remarks: Hande was shot by a police officer following a disagreement after his (drunk) friend approached her as a potential client. Her friend Nil was also injured in the attack. Volkan Hijret, 23, was arrested and is being tried for murder. A term of 41 years is being requested by the prosecution.

name: Amy Griffiths
remarks: Amy was found dead in her flat with head and throat injuries on the night of Monday 14th January. Martin Saberi, 53, has been charged with her murder.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was reportedly tied up and strangled or hanged with a cable during a robbery. Her identity is unknown.

name: Alka
remarks: Alka was murdered by two men after they discovered she was transgender. Her killers then mutilated her genitals before abandoning her body. Reportedly Alka had met Saurabh Gupta and his friend Shashank Gupta at Tatapani festival ground and they drove her to a secluded location before killing her. One of the accused has served punishment for gang-rape in the past. Alka had left her home at the age of 16 after accepting her gender identity.

name: Sussy Montalván
remarks: Sussy was a hairdresser. Her body was found at home after a house fire. The fire was started by her murderer after hanging her with a vest. Subsequently, Hugo Pastén Espinoza, 42, was arrested and confessed to murdering her as well as the cisgender women Catalina álvarez, 16 and Marina Cabrera, 24.

name: Ares Saturno
remarks: Ares and their partner Soren died by suicide together in the same hotel.

name: Soren Neres Denardi
remarks: Soren and their partner Ares died by suicide together in the same hotel.

name: Sheilla Prado ("Sheilla Bombom", "Candy")
remarks: Sheilla died after jumping from the Morrotes bridge in the Oficinas neighborhood. At the time she was being threatened by pimps and she jumped after they cornered her. Her case was treated as suicide and her body was found by firefighters two days later.

name: Quelly da Silva ("Jeninha")
remarks: Quelly was stabbed to death with a shard of glass by a man who found her alone in her family's bar. He then ripped out her heart and took it back to his home. Police found her body with an image of a saint placed on it and her chest cut open. Caio Santos de Oliveira, 20, was arrested and confessed to killing her. Police found Quelly's heart wrapped in a cloth in a cupboard in his home. In October 2019 Quelly's killer was acquitted following a diagnosis of schizoprenia.

name: Yara Serena Camargo
remarks: Yara's decomposing body was found with stab wounds to the neck and back in a vacant lot in the North Zone of Recife on the morning of 22nd January. Police estimate that she was killed at least two days earlier.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found murdered in her home in Colonia Villa Esmeralda. Her body was found by one of her friends with a cable tied around her feet, hands and neck.

name: Nashley Delgado Segovia
remarks: Nashley disappeared on the night of 16th December 2018. Her body was found in a ditch on 23rd January with signs of violence and a gunshot wound.

name: Jésica Benavídez ("Nicky")
remarks: Jésica's body was found in her home in Paraná. Her death is considered suspicious.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of the victim was found with her feet tied lying in a vacant lot near Calle Cártamo, a few meters from Avenida De las Torres. The media misgendered her by reporting that the body was that of a man despite her being found wearing a dress and heels.

name: Ayslaà Souza
remarks: Ayslaà was found beaten to death inside a home on Rua Ary Parreira, in the neighborhood of Ano Bom. Her face was disfigured by the beating she had received.

name: Jujü Periigosåh
remarks: Jujü was shot in the thigh and face in Avenida Radial B in the centre of Camaçari. She died on the way to hospital.

name: Mirna Antonella Di Marzo
remarks: Mirna died in San Bernardo hospital 3 months and 6 days after being brutally beaten and admitted to intensive care. After she was found unconscious José Gustavo Gareca was detained and charged with attempted aggravated homicide for mediating gender violence.

name: Pamela Sandoval Ramírez (Pamela Martínez)
remarks: Pamela was murdered in the salon where she worked between late Saturday 26th and early Sunday 27th January. Her body was found with signs of violence on Monday morning.

name: Tabbo
remarks: The victim was one of three trans people in a vehicle attacked by armed men on a motorcycle. She died and the other two were critically injured. All three were on their way back from performing at a wedding ceremony. A man named Hamdan who was reportedly the organiser of the event has been arrested. Note "Tabbo" is not confirmed to have been her social name - although her deadname is quoted by multiple news sources, only one report gives it was a social name for her.

name: Ana Paula da Costa Ribeiro
remarks: Ana was found dead with multiple stab wounds on the morning of Wednesday 30th January. Her body was found in an area behind a car wash in Rua Militão de Almeida in the São José neighborhood. Police believe she tried to resist the attack as she had injuries to her arms. In June 2019 Felipe Pedro dos Reis, 28, was arrested on suspicion of being responsible for her death and that of two others.

name: Charlene Keroly
remarks: Charlene hanged herself in her home after discovering that her boyfriend was having an affair with her best friend.

name: Ellie Marie Washtock
remarks: Ellie's body was found by her 15 year old son early on Thursday 31st January. She had been shot. Ellie was a private citizen investigating the shooting of Michelle O'Connell in 2010, allegedly by a serving police officer. She had only changed her name legally the same month.

name: Joha González Leal
remarks: Joha was beaten, stripped and robbed on her way to a party by a group of people who wrongly accused her of stealing a mobile phone. She died at the scene. Joha was the youngest of two siblings and lived with her relatives in the Alma Bolivariana neighborhood. She had planned to move to Colombia the following week to work in a beauty salon with other trans women who were waiting for her.

name: Camila Díaz Córdova ("Aurora")
remarks: Camila was killed in San Salvador after she and her friend Paola had been deported there by the US Trump Administration. Both had sought asylum in the USA a year earlier seeking refuge from the violence and transphobia in El Salvador.

name: Laly Heredia Escobar ("Sonia Laly")
remarks: Laly's body was found by a neighbour lying in the street at dawn on Sunday 3rd February. She had been shot 8 times. Her body was found outside a hotel at the intersection of Avenida Monseñor Bufano and Arribeños, Camino de Cintura. According to police she had been killed between 3am and 7am.

name: Daniele Azevedo
remarks: Daniele went missing after leaving a hotel in the Compensa neighborhood on Monday 4th February. According to RedeTransBrasil her body was found two days later.

name: Mellyssa Rodrigues dos Santos
remarks: Mellyssa was beaten around the head with a piece of wood by her boyfriend after he became angry that she was still doing sex work to support herself.

name: Miriam Rivera
remarks: Miriam died in suspicious circumstances. She was a reality TV star who had appeared in Big Brother Australia and the UK TV show "There's Something About Miriam". Miriam was found dead by hanging at her home in Hermosillo.

name: Fabi Cortes Morales
remarks: Fabi was shot in the head at the Caballo Blanco bar in the municipality of Las Choapas. According to witnesses, an unknown person entered the bar, went directly to the victim and fired twice. One of the bullets hit her in the head. Fabi had repeatedly received threats and warnings through WhatsApp messages that circulated in Las Choapas and that they are allegedly sent by a drug cartel.

name: Lolita
remarks: Lolita died of her injuries after a group of unidentified assailants attacked her with a machete.

name: Kaila Alves
remarks: Kayla's body was found in her home on Rua Jerusalém on Monday 11th February. She had been stabbed.

name: Miúda
remarks: Miúda's body was found inside her house in the Valverde neighborhood at dawn on Monday 11th February. She was naked and had 4 gunshot wounds. Note that her name is spelled differently in news reports and social media posts. The latter are assumed to be more likely to be correct.

name: Giuliano Imperato
remarks: Guiliano took his own life by ingesting cyanide shortly after posting a suicide note to a Facebook group. The previous year he had majored in law. Comments on a memorial post on the Facebook group suggest that he was in a lot of emotional pain, suffered from Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) and that his parents had disowned him after he came out.

name: Meg Duram
remarks: Meg was shot in the head in the North Zone of São Paulo by two men on a motorbike. A witness told investigators that she was shot while running away from them.

name: Rajathi
remarks: Rajathi was a priest. Her mutilated body was found inside the sanctum of the Mariamman temple she ran. Her severed head was left outside the temple premises. Her suspected assailants are two men who lived in the vicinity. Both are on the run.

name: Samira Morena
remarks: Samira was stabbed twice in the armpit in a bar in northern Sorocaba. She died in hospital. Witnesses reported that immediately beforehand a group of men had insulted her for being trans. Samira was a hairdresser.

name: Minerva Rubio
remarks: Minerva was killed by an armed group who invaded her house and shot at another person there.

name: Nathyelly Cruz
remarks: Nathyelly's semi-naked body was found on the morning of Thursday 21st February with a wound to the face.

name: V. Barbosa de Aquino
remarks: V. was found dead in the bathroom with wounds to the stomach. There were bloodstains in various parts of the house and some possessions were missing. Forensic experts arrived on site and the professor's body was taken to the Forensic Medical Institute (IML), which will identify the cause of death.

name: Vicente Vera Párraga ("La Verito")
remarks: La Verito was stabbed 10 times in his apartment. The brutality of the murder suggested that the attack was a hate crime.

name: Mirlla Vasques Arcanjo
remarks: Mirlla was beaten to dead with a brick on Camapuã Avenue, Cidade Nova at about 4am on Saturday 23rd February. A client is thought to have been responsible.

name: Faye ("Morena Black")
remarks: Faye reportedly took her own life sometime during the weekend of 23rd/24th February. As someone who worked in the adult movie industry her personality and life has probably been subjected to far more scrutiny than most of us, and inevitably for many the person who they remember will be the media personna rather than the real person.

name: Aghata da Silva Marinho
remarks: Aghata disappeared on Wednesday 20th February. Transgender Europe (TGEU) report that her body was found 5 days later on Monday 25th February.

name: Ana de Lima
remarks: Ana was shot three times late on Tuesday 26th February near her home in the Alto São João neighbourhood. She died at the scene.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot. No other information is known.

name: Thais
remarks: Thais and her (cisgender) boyfriend were found stabbed to death in a public toilet in Paturis Park. Both were homeless drug users.

name: Maxim Brizuela
remarks: Maxim was shot. She was one of four trans women who were killed after accusing several high-grade police officers of people trafficking.

name: Pamela Arenceli
remarks: Pamela was shot. She was one of four trans women who were killed after accusing several high-grade police officers of people trafficking.

name: Name Unknown
remarks:
The victim was an unidentified trans woman found dead in an orange grove near the hermitage of Sant Jaume de Fadrell on the outskirts of Castellón de la Plana.

She died as a result of a blow to the head and was 35-40 years old. Two people have been arrested.

name: Esra
remarks: Esra died by suicide.

name: Laura Gentle Argueta
remarks: Laura was stabbed after leaving a nightclub by a man with whom she had earlier had an argument. Her attacker then ran over her body in a car. A suspect was arrested at Bight Oak Ridge after being persued by the police.

name: Brigitte Galván Uc
remarks: Brigitte died from head injuries several days after being thrown from a vehicle.

name: Fernanda
remarks: Fernanda died by suicide in the Jereissati 1 neighborhood of Maracanaú.

name: Mayla dos Santos
remarks: Mayla was found dead in her home in the Amazonino Mendes neighborhood of Coari. She had been stabbed several times in the neck and back.

name: Maria Paula Murillo Reyes
remarks: María was murdered while working. After her death the commissioner of LGBTI Affairs of the Presidential House called for trans people to be respected in society.

name: Pamela
remarks: Pamela was shot. No other information is known.

name: La Mariposa
remarks: La Mariposa's body was found by police in an abandoned building after an anonymous call. She had been strangled.

name: Marisol Montenegro
remarks: Marisol Montenegro's body was found in her home in Puerto Montt, Los Lago (Chile) on 7 Mar 2019. She had been beaten and strangled and her home robbed.

name: Flávia Santana
remarks: Flávia was found hanging with cuts on her neck and both wrists in her apartment. She had only just arrived back in the country two days earlier. Her family suspect that she was murdered.

name: Perla
remarks: Perla was shot. No other information is known.

name: Levi Matheus Santos (Lívia Dí Castro)
remarks: Levi/Lívia is reported to have died by suicide between 7th and 9th March, possibly after their relationship broke down.

name: Renata Spencer
city: El Cerrito, Tepeji del Río, Hidalgo
location: El Cerrito, Tepeji del Río, Hidalgo (Mexico)
remarks: Renata's body was found near Antigua Mexico-Queretaro (Federal Highway 17) on the morning of Saturday 9th March. She had a head wound and had been beaten.

name: Pâmella
remarks: Pâmella was shot three times. According to her family, she had no involvement in crime and they do not know why she was killed.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found in the street. She had several stab wounds and her neck had been cut, indicating the brutality of the crime.

name: Nazab Abid Shaikh
remarks: Nazab was murdered by Arbaz Ahmed Shaikh, 20, after they argued about his wish to end their relationship. According to the police, they received a distress call early in the morning informing that Nazab was found lying in a pool of blood. Cops found the lock of Nazab's house on the third floor broken and her throat slit by a sharp object.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead in the middle of a mound of garbage on a dirt road from the Lomas de Chapultepec neighborhood. She had been shot three times at around 9am.

name: Pollita Ruiz
remarks: Pollita was shot 5 times at about 3:30pm on Wednesday 13th March by two people on a motorcycle. She died at the scene.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The handcuffed bodies of two trans women were found by the side of the road on 13th March. They had been shot in the head and both bodies showed traces of torture.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The handcuffed bodies of two trans women were found by the side of the road on 13th March. They had been shot in the head and both bodies showed traces of torture.

name: Zaira Betancur
remarks: Zaira was stabbed and killed by a man who was obsessed with her. He was subsequently arrested.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found with stab wounds and her throat slashed, wrapped in a blanket and with her legs tied on a road in colonia Loma de La Palma. Her identity is unknown. The message "Esto va para que no anden chapulineando" was written on a piece of cardboard left with her body.

name: Caio Dantas Monteiro
city: Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro
location: Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro (Brazil)
remarks: Caio and his girlfriend Iasmym Nascimento de Souza da Silva, 20, were stabbed to death by a neighbour who had earlier propositioned Iasmym. She had turned him down. Itamar Bernardo da Silva, 44, was taken into custody and charged with double homicide while trying to escape to Barra Mansa. At the police station he was also found to have an outstanding arrest warrant for the murder of a woman in Araxá, Minas Gerais.

name: Name Unknown
city: Alcaldia Gustavo A. Madero, Ciudad De Mexico
location: Alcaldia Gustavo A. Madero, Ciudad De Mexico (Mexico)
remarks: The victim's body was found wrapped in a blanket and with legs tied. A message left on top of her body suggested that the killing was related to organised crime.

name: Mara da Silva
city: Afonso Bezerra, Rio Grande do Norte
location: Afonso Bezerra, Rio Grande do Norte (Brazil)
remarks: Mara was shot in a bar on 15th March, along with the bar owner, a trans woman named Rebekah. Rebekah survived, but Mara died in hospital in Mossoró two days later.

name: Alessandra
remarks: Alessandra was shot in the neck and abdomen after leaving a party on Urupa Street in Sector 6 of Buritis.

name: B. J. P.
remarks: The victim's body was found in scrubland wrapped in plastic sheeting with signs of having been tortured. Their genitals and limbs had been mutilated.

name: Lara
remarks: Lara was beaten and murdered in an abandoned building on travessa Marcelino de Oliveira. Witnesses said they had seen her in a bar on the night before.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of the victim was found on a vacant plot of land on Saturday 23rd March. There were bloodstains on her head and pieces of bricks near her body.

name: Fabrícia de Moura Lima
remarks: Fabrícia was found dead on the night of Sunday 24th March in the Atheneu Park neighborhood of Goiânia. She had been shot several times. Just three days earlier she had escaped death after running away from an armed attacker.

name: W. Adalí Hernández Rápalo
remarks: W. was found dead inside a home on Sunday 24th March in the village of Dos Caminos. She had been beaten to death and the building set on fire.

name: Celaya Méndez Zelada
remarks: Celaya's body was found by the side of the Coatzacoalcos - Villahermosa road in the municipality of Agua Dulce. Details of the cause of their death were not released, but it is known that the body showed signs of violence.

name: Jazzaline Ware
remarks: Jazzaline was found dead in her apartment. Her death is now being investigated as a homicide.

name: Amma Hajjani
remarks: Hajjani's body was found in the water tank of her home. The elderly transgender woman had been beaten to death.

name: Victoria Medeiros
remarks: Victoria died by suicide. The circumstances and exact date of her death are unknown.

name: Ashanti Carmon
remarks: Ashanti was shot and killed early on the morning of Saturday 30th March. In death, her father erased her identity.

name: Claudia Vera
remarks: Claudia was shot in the Independencia district of Lima in the early hours of Saturday 30th March. A couple harassed Claudia and four other trans women before returning to kill them. She died from 4 gunshot wounds in a nearby hotel. Claudia was a trans activist, human rights defender and founder of Jóvenes Cambiando VIHdas, the HIV Youth Network in Peru.

name: Patricia Rafaela dos Santos Camargo
remarks: Patricia was run over by a truck on Jardim Bela Vista early on Saturday 30th March. The driver fled the scene but subsequently, a man confessed to running her over on purpose.

name: Paty Figueiredo dos Santos
remarks: Paty was strangled and robbed inside her salon at home in the Colonia Terra Nova II neighborhood to the north of Manaus. Her body was found with her hands and feet tied.

name: Vittoria
remarks: Vittoria's body was discovered in a condominium garden on the afternoon of Saturday 30th March by a resident who saw her feet sticking out of the grass. Her cause of death is unknown, but the circumstances are considered suspicious.

name: Crysllaine Guedes da Silva
remarks: Chrysllaine's body was found in a vacant lot on Rua Yone Rodrigues at about 8am on Monday 1st April. She had been stabbed.

name: Shalu
remarks: Shalu was found dead in suspicious circumstances near a bus stop at around 9am on Monday 1st April - the day after International Transgender Day of Visibility.  She had previously complained of being harassed and it is suspected that she was murdered.

name: Dianna Rodrigues
remarks: Dianna was found dead by her mother. She died by suicide.

name: Eduarda Albuquerque
city: Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro
location: Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro (Brazil)
remarks: Eduarda was found in a park, gagged with duct tape and with her hands tied, on the afternoon of 3rd April. Police suspect that she had been tortured and beaten to death.

name: Bárbara
remarks: Bárbara was shot at least five times by two assailants on a motorcycle in the São Caetano neighborhood.

name: L. J. da Silva
remarks: L.'s body was found with stab wounds, four in the chest and one in the back, on the morning of Friday 5th April in a rural area on the Rio Comprid - Varadouro road.

name: Sandrielly Vasconcelos
remarks: Sandrielly's body was found on the morning of Saturday 6th April. Her hands and feet were tied and there was a deep cut in her neck, stab wounds on her body and burns on her back.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was stabbed. No other information is known.

name: Brenda Plaza Vallejos
remarks: Brenda's body was found at around 10:30pm near Cerro Polanco (Polanco Hill). She had been stabbed in the abdomen. Brenda was visiting the city and had only arrived three weeks earlier. She lived in Iquique.

name: Kassandra Solórzano Romero
remarks: Kassandra was a stylist. Her body was found half-naked and with hands and feet tied in her home in the Emaya Bajo neighborhood of Neiva. She had been suffocated with a pillow.

name: Marqueza de Araújo
city: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul
location: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Marqueza was killed by an armed man who broke into the house and shot her while she was sleeping.

name: Malaj Islas
remarks: Malaj was stabbed. Days beforehand, they had written a social network post saying "I will lose my life".

name: Nika Surgutskaya
remarks: Nika was reportedly strangled by her date after he discovered that she was transgender. He then dismembered her body, cooking parts of it and flushing others down the toilet. Her remains were found following a police raid on his apartment after Nika's mother reported her missing. Dr Mikhail Tikhonov, 27, was arrested.

name: Juliane de Fonseca ("Juju")
remarks: Juliane died in a bar on Avenida do Pintadoa after being stabbed in the neck by a man she had been drinking with. The perpetrator was arrested the following day.

name: Ainee Khan
remarks: Ainee was stabbed in the head, face, arms and elsewhere. Her attacker(s) also cut off her hair, presumably as an act of humiliation. She bled to death inside her locked apartment.

name: Sabrina
remarks: Sabrina was shot on the night of Saturday 13th April in the vicinity of Vila Romana in the Industrial District of João Pessoa.

name: Kenia Hilton
remarks: Kenia's body was thrown from a bridge. An autopsy suggested that she had been tortured and killed beforehand. She was one of three trans women murdered in the city in less than 30 days.

name: Tamara
remarks: Tamara was found dead in a hotel in Iztapalapa. She was one of three trans women murdered in the city in less than 30 days.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found with signs of violence in a bush-lined canal on Avenida J do Conjunto Ceará. Police could not identify the victim.

name: Becky González Reyna
remarks: Becky was one of 14 people shot dead on Good Friday in an attack on a birthday party held at a restaurant. Among the dead was a 1 year old boy named Santiago. Becky owned the nearby "La Esquina del Chacal" bar (a venue popular with LGBT+ folks in the area) and it appears that she was the target of the attack. The motive may have been related to a protection racket by a local cartel.

name: Eric Varão
remarks: Eric died by suicide in the Silvio Botelho neighborhood of Boa Vista.

name: E. dos Santos da Rosa
remarks: E. was stabbed by her partner after an argument at their home on Rua St. Helena. She died at the scene. Her killer fled and is now on the run.

name: Jéssica Gómez Rúa ("Pajarita")
remarks: Jéssica was stabbed in the street early on 21st April. She died in hospital. Juan Carlos Gómez Díaz was arrested and charged with aggravated manslaughter.

name: Natalia Delgado Rubio
remarks: Natalia's body was mutilated and her remains dumped inside plastic bags.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died in hospital as a result of an infection following an industrial silicone cosmetic filler injection.

name: Rayssa dos Santos Oliveira
remarks: Rayssa was shot in the head by two people on a motorcycle. She died in hospital two days later.

name: Catalina Casquete Holguín ("Cata")
remarks: Cata's body was found on the Puente Alterno Norte bridge to the north east of Guayaquil at dawn on 25th April. Her death is considered suspicious.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found with hands and feet tied, and with gunshot wounds in the head.

name: Yaritza Angélica Millones López
remarks: Yaritza was found in her apartment in the Balvanera neighborbood. She had been dead for several days. Yaritza had moved from Peru to Argentina three years earlier after experiencing systemic discrimination in her birth country.

name: Jasmyne Fontile de Brito
city: Guarapes, Natal, Rio Grande do Norte
location: Guarapes, Natal, Rio Grande do Norte (Brazil)
remarks: Jasmyne was transitioning. Her body was found with gunshot wounds on a dirt road in the Guarapes neighorhood on the morning of Tuesday 30th April. Police believe that she had been taken to the scene and killed there.

name: T.
remarks: T. was stabbed several times in the back and chest and had his neck cut.

name: El Choco
remarks: El Choco's body was found on the street. Her hands had been tied and she was shot in the head.

name: Larissa Rodrigues da Silva
remarks: Larissa was beaten with a piece of wood on the corner of Alameda dos Tacaúnas and Avenida Indianópols in the Planalto Paulista neighborhood. Her attacker fled the scene.

name: Melissa Borges
remarks: Melissa's body was found behind the Vereador Joãozinho sports centre in Vila São João. She had been stabbed 10 times and one of her hands severed and stuffed in her mouth. The day afterwards José Ferreira de Souza, 29, (known as "Ferreirinha") confessed to killing her. He claimed that he had acted in self defence, and confessed that he had killed her elseware but dragged her body to the location it was eventually found.

name: Heart Pontanes
remarks: Heart was killed by two men shortly after they took a selfie with her. She died while being treated for her injuries.

name: Milo Mazurkiewicz
remarks: Milo identified as non-binary trans and had expressed frustration with clinicians refusing to recognise their identity. According to their friend Jesso they mostly used they/their pronouns but didn't mind she/her. When a vigil held for them in Warsaw on 24th May it was attacked by anti-LGBT+ hate.

name: M. Dantas da Silva
remarks: M.'s body was found on the morning of Monday 6th May near the Jardim Virgínia neighborhood of Guariba. She had been stabbed.

name: Ana Paula Portyllho
remarks: Ana died after posting a suicide note to Facebook.

name: Yara Souza
remarks: Yara was killed at the Kankun Motel on Avenida Presidente Kennedy on the morning of Friday 10th May. Her killer was arrested at the scene.

name: Luana de Andrade
remarks: Luana was chased by two men in the São Luís neighborhood of Balsas. She took shelter in a building but they followed her and shot her 4 times. In June 2019 the police arrested Franklin Warley Sousa Martins, 20. Two other suspects are being saught in connection with the crime. According to the police Luana was involved in drug trafficking and was a murder suspect herself, but that doesn't excuse what happened to her.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found on the afternoon of Saturday 11th May in the Monte Hebron neighborhood. She was half naked and had bruises on her arms, legs and head.

name: Taila Silveira Pacheco Santos
remarks: Taila was found dead late on Sunday 12th May in an alley on avenida Dom Pedro I in the Santa Branca neighborhood. She had been stabbed multiple times.

name: Gökçe Naz Saygi
remarks: Gökçe was stabbed 7 times in the back in her home. Police found her body after being called to the scene by neighbours. Police examined CCTV footage to attempt to identify her murderer. Subsequently, Şahin Yalç?n, 20, was arrested by police in the Kepez region. In September 2019 he appeared in court charged with her murder.

name: Natalia
remarks: Natalia was found unresponsive in a building, she died at the scene. Local media reported that she may have died after fleeing from a taxi driver to avoid paying him, but reading between the lines it sounds like she might have been beaten and robbed elseware and either flagged down a cab to escape or been attacked by the taxi driver himself, before running away and entering the building where she died. An investigation for the crime of culpable homicide was opened by the police. As her body was found with breasts exposed and trousers open it is presumed that she also suffered an attempted sexual assault. Like so many cases we may never know anything more about her or what really happened, but it's pretty clear that she was a victim of some kind of violence.

name: Claire Legato
remarks: Claire died in hospital on 14th May after being shot in the head on 15th April while she tried to defend her best friend's mum from an abusive boyfriend. Claire had intervened to defend her best friend's mother from him as he argued with her over a tax return cheque.

name: Dulce
city: Alcaldia Benito Juarez, Ciudad De Mexico
location: Alcaldia Benito Juarez, Ciudad De Mexico (Mexico)
remarks: Dulce's body was found with traces of sexual abuse inside her apartment after neighbours heard screams.

name: Lu
remarks: Lu was found dead by suicide in the house where she lived alone. Her exact date of death is unknown, but it was somewhere between 10th and 14th May.

name: Bibiu de Lima Pires
remarks: Bibiu was shot in the head and chest on Rua Osvaldo Cruz in the Conjunto Palmeiras neighborhood late on Wednesday 15th May. She may have been the victim of an attempted robbery.

name: A. A. Silva Costa
remarks: A. was found dead on the street at dawn on Thursday 16th May after being beaten with a blunt object.

name: Alana Ferreira
remarks: Alana was killed after an argument with other trans sex workers on Rua Moses Kauffman in the Barra Funda neighborhood of São Paulo.

name: Rekha Desai ("Reva")
remarks: Rekha was stabbed by her abusive partner. A 25-year-old man was arrested.

name: Muhlaysia Booker
remarks: Muhlaysia was found dead in the street by police in East Dallas at around 6:40 a.m. A month earlier she had been brutally attacked outside apartments in south Dallas.

name: Angela Paola Fajardo
remarks: Angela was stabbed in the Calzada San Juan 7-87 neighborhood, reportedly in a dispute over a sex work "point". Two other trans women were arrested.

name: Jesusa Ventura Reyes
remarks: Jesusa was kidnapped on Saturday 18th May. Her decapitated body was discovered the following day, and her head was subsequently found in an abandoned cooler. Jesusa had begun her gender transition just two years ago.

name: Michelle Simone Washington ("Tamika")
remarks: Michelle was found with gunshot wounds in North Philadelphia just after 5am on Sunday 19th May. She died in hospital.

name: Thaylla Rodrigues de Moura
city: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul
location: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Thaylla's body was found in front of the bus terminal on Avenida Bandeirantes at dawn on Sunday 19th May. She had a stab wound near her neck. Her identity was not initially known as she was not carrying any identifying documents when she was found. Her body was eventually identified by her sister.

name: José Matías De la Fuente Guevara
remarks: Matías died by suicide after suffering constant bullying and transphobia at his school. Staff refused to recognise his gender and in death he was misgendered by the authorities.

name: Paris Cameron
remarks: Paris was one of three people - the others being two gay men - shot at around 5am on Saturday 25th May. Prosecutors allege that the victims were targetted because they were LGBTQ. Davon Robinson, 18, has been charged with three counts of first degree murder.

name: Britany Sanchez Zárate
remarks: Britany was shot twice by two assailants in a sports field in colonia Arroyo Frío. Days beforehand she had been crowned princess of the Gay Carnival of Misantla.

name: Gala Estefanía Perea
remarks: Gala was strangled by her partner after an argument. Neighbours called the police after hearing her screaming.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of a group of transgender women in Hyderabad's old city area attacked by a mob who believed false rumours spread via WhatsApp.

name: Elaynne Markes
city: Lucas do Rio Verde, Mato Grosso
location: Lucas do Rio Verde, Mato Grosso (Brazil)
remarks: Elayanne was shot by two men on a motorcycle while waiting for clients.

name: Titi Gulley
remarks: Titi was found hanging from a tree in a park. The coroner ruled her death a suicide, but her family and friends believe she was murdered. According to the Portland Mercury, Titi was genderfluid: her family knew her as a cisgender gay man named Otis who sometimes dressed in drag - but among friends, Gulley typically presented as a woman, used she/her pronouns, and went by the name Titi.

name: R. Adelso Rodriguez Alonzo
remarks: R. was found lying on a road with head injuries. She died in hospital. She was a stylist who worked in a beauty salon in Teculután.

name: Techi
remarks: Techi's body was found in the waters of the rio del Chili on 29th May. She had last been seen three days earlier. Her death is being treated as a possible suicide.

name: Jahy Bianchini
remarks: Jahy and a friend were attacked by clients during an attempted robbery on the morning of Thursday 30th May. Jahy was shot during the attack, but her friend survived.

name: Leleco Pereira dos Santos
remarks: Leleco was murdered at around half past midnight on Thursday 30th May. Apparently she had been receiving threats. Reports differ on the circumstances of her murder and whether she was shot or stabbed.

name: Rosinha do Beco
remarks: Rosinha was beaten to death with a piece of wood in her home. Her attacker then started a fire to try to conceal the evidence. A 15-year-old teenager is being sought by police. Rosinha was a street vendor who was well known in the city.

name: Chynal Lindsey
remarks: Chynal's body was found after someone called the police to report a body in White Rock Lake. Police reported that her body showed "obvious signs of homicidal violence".

name: Johana Medina León ("Joa")
remarks: Joa was a detained Salvadorian asylum seeker. She had been asking for medical help for nearly 2 months, but ICE only took her to hospital after she lost consciousness.

name: Mayte Castro Anay ("Pamela")
remarks: Mayte ("Pamela") and her friend Miranda ("Chiqui") were shot in the head after attending a football match. A witness reported seeing motorcycles leaving the scene.

name: Fabiola
remarks: Fabiola's body was found lying in a pool of blood.

name: Miranda Pilar Ruiz ("Chiqui")
remarks: Miranda ("Chiqui") and her friend Mayte ("Pamela") were shot in the head after attending a football match. A witness reported seeing motorcycles leaving the scene.

name: Rose
remarks: Rose was homeless and cared for abandoned street animals. She was shot 3 times in the Curado IV neighborhood of Jaboatão dos Guararapes.

name: Austin Smith
remarks: Austin died by suicide. His death was reported by his best friend.

name: Chanel Scurlock
remarks: Chanel was found just after midnight by Robeson County Sheriff's Office deputies who arrived after reports of gunfire in the area. She had been shot.

name: Leandro Vicente
remarks: Leandro was a trans man. All we know is that he died by suicide, and his profile was published to a Brazilian memorial group.

name: Layleen Cubilette Polanco Xtravaganza
remarks: Layleen was found dead in a jail cell in the Rose M. Singer women's facility on Rikers Island on the afternoon of Friday 7th June.

name: Shakira ("La Moy")
remarks: Shakira was stoned to death by a group of men. Her body lay in the street in full view of her frightened neighbours before the police finally removed it several hours later.

name: Alex Milkovich
remarks: Alex's body was found on 10th June. He had disappeared on 1st June after going to visit someone he thought was a friend. A murder suspect was arrested on 17th June.

name: Pamela
remarks: Pamela was shot in the back. CCTV footage shows her falling on the sidewalk.

name: Zoe Spears
remarks: Zoe was found lying in the street (not far from where Ashanti Carmon had been murdered in March) by police responding to an emergency call. She had been shot and died at the scene.

name: Jony Sosa Sanchez
remarks: Jony was found dead inside her room by a neighbour. She had been beaten and stabbed. Her hands and feet were tied and there was a pool of blood on the floor.

name: Nahara Sereya
remarks: Nahara was shot in the early hours of Sunday 16th June.

name: Defne Yilmaz
remarks: Defne was found dead in her bathroom on 16th June. She had been stabbed in the body and neck. Her killer was arrested the following day.

name: Pollyane Weneck dos Reis
remarks: Pollyane was found lying in the street with several stab wounds and bleeding from the left hand side of her chest. She died in hospital.

name: Lohane Silva de Lira ("Jasmine")
remarks: Lohane's half-naked body was found in a thicket on Rua José Alves Lins in the Novo Horizonte neighborhood. She had been stabbed and her body dragged into the street. Her boyfriend Robson José da Silva is being sought in connection with the crime. Note that some news reports give her name was Jasmine.

name: Doris Hernandez
remarks: Doris was murdered. No other information is known.

name: Rita
remarks: Rita died by suicide.

name: Brooklyn Lindsey
remarks: Brooklyn's body was found on the porch of an abandoned home. In July 2019 Marcus Lewis, 41, was charged with her murder.

name: J. P. Moreno
remarks: J. was shot dead in a supermarket parking lot.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of two transgender women who were tortured and beaten to death. Their bodies were recovered by police from a locked house.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of two transgender women who were tortured and beaten to death. Their bodies were recovered by police from a locked house.

name: Maya
remarks: Maya was murdered by her family after going to the police to ask for protection. According to Pakistani news outlet Samaa TV her father has been arrested but police are still searching for her uncle and brothers.

name: Jessyca Ananias
remarks: Jessyca was shot in the head by a client at the intersection of Avenida Cônego João Lima and Bernado Sayão in the Entroncamento sector at around 10:30pm on Tuesday 2nd July. Reportedly a client had accused her of stealing his phone, and when she denied it and refused to give him her own phone he shot her.

name: Antonia Laínez Larios
remarks: Antonia was shot several times at around 5:50pm on Wednesday 3rd July. She was a stylist.

name: Cecelia Cranko
remarks: Cecelia died in a suspicious fire at her home in the early hours of Friday 5th July. A week earlier she had been the victim of a carjacking and shooting.

name: Patricia Araújo
remarks: Patricia died after spending 10 days in hospital. She was a model and actress, and suffered from depression. Her cause of death has not been confirmed, but suicide seems likely.

name: Romy
remarks: Romy's body was found floating in the river Garonne on Saturday 6th July. An investigation into her death concluded that she died by suicide.

name: Santiago Carvajal ("Santi")
remarks: Santiago was a TV presenter and LGBT+ community leader. She was shot on Friday 5th July and died in hospital in the early hours of the following day. She presented a TV programme called "La Galaxia de Santi" ("The Galaxy of Santi") in which she often criticised local authorities. It is believed that she was shot at 4 avenida and calle 15 after being approached by a group of people. At the time she was on her way to have dinner with friends or contacts.

name: Shakira Fernández de la Hoz
remarks: Shakira was stabbed during a fight with another trans woman. Puca Guerra Barrientos has been arrested.

name: Bessy Michelle Ferrera
remarks: Bessy and a colleague were shot while waiting for customers  at around 1am on Monday 8th July. Her colleague survived. Police arrested two suspects.

name: Name Unknown
city: Xochimilco, Ciudad de Mexico, Estado de México
location: Xochimilco, Ciudad de Mexico, Estado de México (Mexico)
remarks: The naked body of the victim was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the water near a pier known as Puente de Urrutia. She had been dead for several days.

name: Gurpreet
remarks: Gurpreet died by suicide.

name: Carly
remarks: Carly was stabbed by a client who called her over to his car at around midnight on Sunday 14th July. She died in hospital.

name: Angie Digiacomo
remarks: Angie was killed by two pit bull terriers belonging to a man who lived near the vacant lot where she was working. Her colleagues claim that he released them on purpose.

name: Lucía Torres Mansilla/Lucía Barrera ("Lucía La Loba")
remarks: Lucia's body was found by a friend in her bedroom on Thursday 18th July. She had multiple stab wounds and had last been seen alive on Sunday evening. An autopsy suggested that she had been killed about 36 hours before her body was found.

name: Samara Araújo
remarks: Samara died by suicide. She suffered from severe depression.

name: S. Medina
remarks: S. was found dead in a swimming pool in a property belonging to the family or relatives of a retired federal judge. The cause of her death is unknown, but there are suspicions that she may have been sexually assaulted before dying.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found after a 911 call was made on the morning of Friday 19th July. She had been tortured and executed. Local LGBT+ organisations are trying to identify the victim.

name: Denali Berries Stuckey
remarks: Denali's body was found with gunshot wounds by the side of the road at 4am on Saturday 20th July.

name: Didem Akay
remarks: Didem hanged herself in a hotel room after suffering from transphobic abuse and psychological trauma. She was a close friend of Hande Kader, who was killed in August 2016.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was attacked, mutilated, and lynched by a mob who accused her of being a child abductor when she was passing through their village. At the time she was travelling from town to town in order to beg for money.

name: Sandy Carrillo Bello
remarks: Sandy was shot dead inside the bar she managed.

name: Bubba Walker
remarks: Bubba Walker's body was found after a fire in an abandoned house on 27th July. She had been reported as missing but was not identified until 3rd September. The cause of the fire is unknown.

name: Muskan
remarks: Muskan and her friend Nadia were both found murdered in their room near Jinnah Town Harappa railway station. Their bodies showed signs of having been tortured.

name: Nadia
remarks: Nadia and her friend Muskan were both found murdered in their room near Jinnah Town Harappa railway station. Their bodies showed signs of having been tortured.

name: Sasha María Rivas Martínez
remarks: Sasha died after a cosmetic filler injection. An autopsy revealed she had suffered an intracranial hemorrhage caused by the mixture of oils injected into her chest.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died by suicide. Her identity is unknown.

name: Tracy Single
remarks: Tracy was found dead in a gas station parking lot on I-10. Her boyfriend Joshua Dominic Bourgeois, 25, was arrested.

name: Kiki Fantroy
remarks: Kiki was reportedly shot shortly after 4:30 a.m. Wednesday in an area not far from her home. She died in hospital. Subsequently William Watson, 17, was arrested after being identified by a witness as the person who shot her.

name: Rosalinda Pérez Berigüete
city: Chalona, San Juan de la Maguana
location: Chalona, San Juan de la Maguana (Dominican Republic)
remarks: Rosalinda's body was found with stab wounds and signs of beating. Police arrested Alexis Ortiz Céspedes, 31, and José Augusto Meran Vicente, 32.

name: Pebbles LaDime Doe
remarks: Pebbles was found dead in a driveway on Sunday 4th August. Despite identifying as female on Facebook, news outlets and her family consistently misgendered her.

name: Jordan Cofer
remarks: Jordan was one of the victims of the Ohio mass shooting on Sunday 4th August. The perpetrator - his brother - was shot dead at the scene by police.

name: Karla Fernanda Silva
remarks: Karla was poisoned as a result of taking diet pills. The drugs are suspected to have contained rat poison.

name: Gabriele Oliveira ("Princess")
remarks: Gabriele's body was found along with that of Robson Carlos da Silva in a closed bar on Monday 5th August. Both had been shot.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead on the morning of Tuesday 6th August. She had been shot in the face.

name: Alondra García
remarks: Alondra's body was found in her home. She had been stabbed 5 times.

name: J. A. Cermeño Medina
remarks: J.'s body was found on the street and was subsequently identified by relatives. She had been shot 3 times.

name: Angi García ("La Gata")
remarks: Angi's body was found in her home by family members on Wednesday 7th August. She had been strangled.

name: Cris García Aponte
remarks: Cris was found dead at home after reportedly ingesting poison. Blood was found on her face and her death is considered suspicious. Chris was an active member of the LGTBI community of the Huaquillas canton and worked as a stylist.

name: Keyiariah Quick
remarks: Keyiariah was found dead on 10th August. Although she was initially widely reported to have been murdered, her family subsequently requested that her death not be reported as such.

name: Aylin Hernández Gómez
city: San Cristóbal de Las Casas, Chiapas
location: San Cristóbal de Las Casas, Chiapas (Mexico)
remarks: Aylin's body was found covered by a motel bedsheet and dumped in undergrowth. Her body had signs of sexual violence and she had been strangled.

name: W. Félix de Oliveira
remarks: W. was beaten and stoned to death inside a residence in the Pajuçara neighborhood. Two men were arrested.

name: Sara Miranda de Souza ("Tayla")
remarks: Tayla was stabbed in the neck after an argument. Police arrested Vitor Henrique, 22, near the scene of the murder.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was stabbed following an argument. According to two witnesses, the murder came after a fight between the victim and the perpetrator who, before stabbing her, punched and then kicked her while she was already lying on the ground. Her killer was arrested.

name: Abril Navarro Salazar
city: Ciudad de Mexico, Estado de México
location: Ciudad de Mexico, Estado de México (Mexico)
remarks: Abril died from multiple stab wounds after being attacked in the street.

name: Nathacha Ruby Flores ("Samantha")
remarks: Nathacha was stabbed outside her home. She was a hairdresser. Note that reports variously name her as Natasha Ruby Arévalo Carvajal, Nathacha Ruby Flores (the name on her Facebook profile), Ruby or Samantha.

name: Aline da Silva
remarks: Aline was stabbed in the neck by a stranger at a bus stop. She was homeless and an activist for the Landless Rural Workers Movement of the state of Pernambuco.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found by police dumped in a stream with her hands tied. She had been suffocated.

name: Ashley
remarks: Ashley's body was found on the street near a church on the morning of Wednesday 21th August. She had been stabbed.

name: Kate Maikelly de Jesus Barbosa
remarks: Kate's body was found in undergrowth near a waste disposal unit. The body had a cut to the right hand and bruising to the face but showed no evidence of the cause of death.

name: Daniela Martinez
remarks: Daniela was found tied and with her feet burned having been beaten. She died in hospital. She had been attacked twice before.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot 3 times by two men on a scooter while leaving the bar where she worked in the early hours of the morning. She died at the scene.

name: Hani
remarks: Hani was shot 5 times when gunman broke into the house she was renting.

name: Roberta Rodrigues ("Roberta Xirrara")
remarks: Roberta was shot.

name: Sana Khan
remarks: Sana was stabbed to death by her brother. She was a Pashto musician and her murder follows that of several others in the province.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot in the head at the entrance to a bar and died in hospital. She had previously spoken out against homophobic statements made by the authorities.

name: Brigitte Escalona Escobar
remarks: Brigitte was a hairdresser. She was found dying in the street after a robbery after leaving for work. Her body showed signs of having been suffocated and had sustained multiple blows. The attacker stripped her of her clothes, purse, a chain, cell phone and some sandals she had bought.

name: Giselle Andrea Gutiérrez Valencia
remarks: Giselle died in possible suicide from propane gas poisoning in her bathroom. Her body was found lying on a mat by her ex-partner.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was stabbed after an attempted robbery.

name: Bee Love Slater
remarks: Bee's body was found inside her burnt out car. Some reports state that she had been tied up and shot. Subsequently  Jamson Richemond, 29, was identified as a person of interest.

name: Bailey Reeves
remarks: Bailey was found with multiple gunshot wounds after a report of a shooting on Parkwood Avenue at around 8:05pm on Monday 2nd September. She died in hospital.

name: Andra Mora López
remarks: Andra's body was found by the Ibagué - Espinal road in Tolima (Colombia) with severe injuries suggesting that she had been run over by a hit and run driver.

name: Andrew Elijah Martinez
remarks: Andrew died by suicide while in the care of the transitional parenting system of LA County.

name: Victoria Santos Falcão
remarks: Victoria was shot by two assilants who broke into her house in what appears to be a targetted execution.

name: Ana Paula
remarks: Ana was beaten with a hammer inside her home. Neighbours had heard screams and called the police, but when they arrived they found her body.

name: Yuri Gabriel Castro Farias
remarks: Yuri was approached by three men, tied to a pole and executed with three shots to the head. Afterwards his killers dragged his body up the street.

name: Carolline Dias
city: Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul
location: Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Carolline was shot in the street at around 5:30am on Saturday 7th September. She died in hospital.

name: Nemer da Silva Rodrigues
city: Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul
location: Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Nemer was stabbed after a fight. Police were called after neighbours heard shouting, and witnesses say that her assailant stabbed her at lest 12 times. Her murder was the second in the city in 24 hours.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of two whose body was dismembered after they were killed and the remains dumped in various parts of the city.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of two whose body was dismembered after they were killed and the remains dumped in various parts of the city.

name: Lara Crespo
remarks: Lara died by suicide. She was the co-founder of Transexual Portugal and an organiser of Lisbon Pride.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead in her room. She had been strangled with a sheet by a client or sexual partner.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found in a state of decomposition near a drainage channel on Tuesday 10th September. Her identity and date and cause of death are unknown.

name: Ja'leyah-Jamar
remarks: Ja'leyah-Jamar was shot. Police have released a photo of a suspect being sought in connection with their murder. Subsequently relatives stated that Jamar was a gender nonconforming gay man rather than a trans woman. We obviously can't ask Ja'leyah, but it is not unusual for friends and family to have different perceptions of the gender of an individual.

name: Shokir Shavkatov
remarks: Shokir Shavkatov was found murdered after leaving a nightclub with two men. She was decapitated and dismembered. After media published details of the hate crime, local activists confirmed her gender identity.

name: Bruna Torres
remarks: Bruna's body was found gagged and with hands and feet tied in scrubland alongside the SP-215 highway in the Cidade Aracy neighborhood of São Carlos. The victim had a broken neck and showed signs of violence on the face, bruising of the eyes and bleeding from the mouth and nose. Arrest warrants were subsequently issued for two people.

name: Luana Piovani
city: Senador Elói de Souza, Rio Grande do Norte
location: Senador Elói de Souza, Rio Grande do Norte (Brazil)
remarks: Luana's body was found naked and with signs of violence. She had reportedly been stoned to death.

name: Elisha Chanel Stanley ("Elisha Diamond")
remarks: Elisha was found dead while visiting family in downtown Pittsburgh on Monday 16th September. The circumstances of her death have not yet been confirmed. Elisha was a professional mental health care worker who was working for MBI Health Services LLC in Washington DC. She had gone back to Pittsburgh to be with family.

name: Reena
remarks: Reena and a cisgender man named Sahil were both found dead on railway tracks on the morning of Monday 16th September. Their causes of death are unknown.

name: Jessa Remiendo
remarks: Jessa's naked body was found on Patar Beach on the morning of Tuesday 17th September. Her right eye had been gouged out and her neck almost cut through.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was a trans woman and sex worker. She was raped, killed by a knife, and her body thrown into the water. Friends and parents confirmed her trans identity.

name: Emmanuelle Agostinho da Silva Barros ("Manu")
remarks: Emmanuelle was stabbed in the neck by a client. They had argued after he refused to pay her.

name: Leandro Parra Hermosilla
remarks: Leandro was a young trans man who died after being stabbed by a 17 year old during a fight. The perpetrator was arrested.

name: Bruna Surfistinha de Freitas ("Bruna Bruninha")
remarks: Bruna was shot while in the shower by two people who broke into her home. They were seen running from the scene by witnesses.

name: Itali Marlowe
remarks: Itali was shot multiple times by a man she was living with. He fled the scene on foot prior to the arrival of police officers. Subsequently Raymond Donald Williams, 23, was arrested and charged with murder.

name: Médely Razard
remarks: Médely was beaten, raped and strangled with wire.

name: Sara Fernández ("Paloma Barreto")
remarks: Sara was found dead from multiple stab wounds in the apartment she was renting. She was a Brazilian sex worker who also went by the name "Paloma Barreto". On 23rd September Allison Oliveira, 24, was arrested on suspicion of her murder and remanded in custody.

name: Itzayana López Hernández
city: Ciudad de México, Estado de México
location: Ciudad de México, Estado de México (Mexico)
remarks: Itzayana was found hanging in her apartment. Despite evidence she had been strangled by an ex-partner beforehand, the authorities categorised her death as a suicide and closed the case.

name: Mhelody Polan Bruno ("Mhel")
remarks: Mhelody was killed while on vacation in Australia. Her friends claim that she was raped before being killed. Mheloldy was a Philippine citizen who worked as a call center agent in Makati City, Metro Manilla and had been due to fly home on 28th September. NSW police confirmed that a man has been arrested and charged with manslaughter.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died in hospital after setting fire to the mattress inside her cell. Four officers have been relieved of duty.

name: Dymun Dupree
remarks: Dymun went missing on 2nd April 2016. A human skull was found with gunshot wounds on 12th May 2016, but was not identified by DNA testing as hers until September 2019. Her date of death and the identity of her killer (or killers) are unknown. Dymun was obviously not included on the TDoR 2016 memorial list released in November 2016 by Transgender Europe (TGEU). The date of her identification is used for this report in order that she might be remembered at TDoR 2019 this November.

name: Yoselín Marín Velasco
remarks: Yoselin's body was found with gunshot wounds on a public road in the early hours of Saturday 28th September. Yoselin was a beautician.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found with her hands and feet tied and covered in blood in the early hours of Saturday 28th September.

name: Junia Franco
remarks: Júnia's body was found on a back road in the Morumbi neighborhood at around 1:20am on Sunday 29th September. She had been stabbed 13 times.

name: Chhaya
remarks: No information is known.
